string.value: #p9010010# is preparing for a huge party to celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary and is in need of lots of materials.
Collect #t04032300#s and bring them to Cassandra.
You delivered the party materials to #p9010010#.
I'm glad you're here #b#h0##k. I've been preparing for the MapleStory 5th Anniversary party, and there are many things that I need. Do you think you can help me collect some materials?

I should have #b#p9000021##k do this since he is perfect for it. But I can't seem to find him for some reason... Maybe he went on vacation without telling me. In any case, I just need you to bring me #b#e20 #t04032300:#s#k#n. Thanks!
Are you refusing? I guess you don't want to help us celebrate MapleStory's 5th Anniversary. I've never seen any good happen to those who refuse me...
It doesn't look like you've collected all the party supplies yet. Check to see if you have #b20 #t04032300#s#k.
